Articles.Content: Hey everyone. I just signed up for the forum today. I have been around for a month or so. I have only put in about 125 hours into the career mode. I've made several landings on mun and back and have made it to mars and back. I have only played stock so far but im now thinking about downloading a few mods. I want MechJeb more and more. I'm currently working on docking which I have yet to successfully complete. I look forward to working with everyone here on our space exploration.
Hello rebel4988. Welcome to the forum, and good luck with your first docking. It's one of the game's major milestones, and will give you an immense sense of accomplishment.

Did I hear someone say docking!

There's a link to a tutorial/pdf on everything you'd ever need to know about it in my signature. Still working on the asteroid bit...

Anyways, hello there!

Welcome aboard!

And good luck with your docking!
